Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.util

Class Padding

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.util.Padding
public class Padding extends Object
A string utility that allows to add padding and margin.

Note that this does not work with minecraft font yet...

  • Constructor Details

    • Padding

      public Padding(@Nonnull int... padding)
      Creates a new padding instance.
      Parameters:
      padding - - Padding size; Should be the same as formatted words size.

  • Method Details

    • setFillCharacters

      public Padding setFillCharacters(@Nonnull char... fillChar)
      Sets the fill characters. Each character corresponds to which will be will after a word. If the first character is '.', it will be filled after the first word.
      Parameters:
      fillChar - - Characters to fill.

    • format

      @Nonnull public String format(@Nonnull Object... objects)
      Performs a formatting on the given objects.
      Parameters:
      objects - - Objects to format.

    • formatPrefix

      public String formatPrefix(@Nullable String marginPrefix, @Nonnull Object... objects)
      Performs a formatting on the given objects. A margin must be > 0 for prefix and suffix to work!
      Parameters:
      marginPrefix - - Prefix to prepend; Prefix will be formatted in the left margin.
      objects - - Objects to format.

    • formatPrefixIf

      public String formatPrefixIf(boolean condition, @Nonnull String ifTrue, @Nonnull String ifFalse, @Nonnull Object... objects)

    • formatPrefixSuffix

      @Nonnull public String formatPrefixSuffix(@Nullable String marginPrefix, @Nullable String marginSuffix, @Nonnull Object... objects)
      Performs a formatting on the given objects. A margin must be > 0 for prefix and suffix to work!
      Parameters:
      marginPrefix - - Prefix to prepend; Prefix will be formatted in the left margin.
      marginSuffix - - Suffix to append; Prefix will be formatted in the right margin.
      objects - - Objects to format.

    • getPadding

      public int getPadding(int index)
      Gets the padding for the given index; or 1 if out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      index - - Index.
      Returns:
      the padding for the given index; or 1 if out of bounds.

    • getLeftMargin

      public int getLeftMargin()
      Gets the left margin. Defaults to 0.
      Returns:
      the left margin. Defaults to 0.

    • setLeftMargin

      public Padding setLeftMargin(int margin)
      Sets the left margin. Margin is what surrounds the string from left and right.
      Parameters:
      margin - - Left margin.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the margin is negative.

    • getRightMargin

      public int getRightMargin()
      Gets the right margin. Defaults to 0.
      Returns:
      the right margin. Defaults to 0.

    • setRightMargin

      public Padding setRightMargin(int margin)
      Sets the right margin. Margin is what surrounds the string from left and right.
      Parameters:
      margin - - Right margin.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the margin is negative.

    • setMargin

      public Padding setMargin(int margin)
      Sets both the left and the right margin to the given value. Margin is what surrounds the string from left and right.
      Parameters:
      margin - - Left and right margin.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the margin is negative.
